Description:
Required Skills to be successful Prequalification of consultants
Definition of design scope clauses, deliverables, etc., completeness and absence of any ‘gaps’
Coordination with designers- clarity and accuracy of communicating DFC’s requirements
Review of design packages
Identification of cost/ time/ quality implication of any design change and recommendation thereof
Team Management
Proficiency in MS Office (Word/ Excel) MS Project
Knowledge of Primavera software Behavioural Competencies :Teamwork
Communication
Professional Knowledge
Training and Coaching
Leadership skills What equips you for the role Minimum Qualifications and Knowledge:Engineering Honours Degree and Chartered Civil Engineer or any other equivalent degree.                                                           Minimum Experience:10 to 15 years hands-on experience in Design and ConstructionFamiliarity with design standards, codes and practicesJob Details
